text: Den Max is a children's book series. The books were written by Barbro Lindgren. Eva Eriksson illustrated the books. == Books == *Max bil - 1981 *Max kaka - 1981 *Max nalle - 1981 *Max balja - 1982 *Max boll - 1982 *Max lampa - 1982 *Max potta - 1986 *Max dockvagn - 1986 *Titta Max grav! - 1991 *Max bl√∂ja - 1994 *Max napp - 1994 ==References== *Worldcat
title: Max (book series)
